title: About
text:
About this blog
My name is Hannah Preissler. I am a senior at the University of Nebraska- Lincoln and I am studying Sports Media and Communication. I am a member of Inner Circle, a leadership organization for student-athletes to help improve professional development. I am a member of the track and field team at UNL as well. Outside of sports and academics, I have a photography business that keeps me busy.
